title: Battery Status API
body: Allows access to see the battery level of the device's battery.

comments.body: Please fuzz the output slightly, so that it cannot be used to track devices or users.
I'd be pretty keen on seeing the battery API along with most of the other mobile APIs get tracking with Edge. Really needs a good push from additional parties to get it to a stable state.
Could be used with some tweaks like: if the battery is under 25% a power-saving mode starts in Edge.
Sounds good to me as long as its not too intrusive
this were very interesting for us.
